abstract: DealBook Online; National Association for Law Placement says women and blacks have made almost no progress in recent years in increasing their ranks at major United States law firms.
lead_paragraph: The percentage of women associates dropped in the last five years, and the percentage of African-American associates has declined every year since 2009.

headline.main: Women and Blacks Make Little Progress at Big Law Firms

snippet: The percentage of women associates dropped in the last five years, and the percentage of African-American associates has declined every year since 2009.
